name: We Were Friends, Once... (FULL VERSION)
description:
Disclaimer: Though this is a work of fiction, similarities to real people, places, and events are intentional. If you think you are in this story, please don't sue me. If you are not, please don't hunt down anyone who is.

FEATURES:

  • over 3000 readable words
  • two mildly confusing endings (plus one dummy ending)
  • choices?
  • multiple art styles for some reason
  • people that look like animals, but are definitely people
  • infodumping
  • deadnaming (sorry, fellow trans people!)
  • fewer previews than recommended because Spoilers

DOES NOT FEATURE:

  • the central character
  • any audio whatsoever
  • nice art
  • readme: the Spoiler Cut (I'll push a devlog when I add it in; please ask questions in the meantime)
